docs.title: Galaxea Documentation
docs.text: Welcome. Explore simulation, datasets, and diffusion policies for the Galaxea R1 series.

docs.title: Quick links
docs.text:
• Galaxea DP: end-to-end diffusion policy pipeline
  • Galaxea Manipulation Simulator: environments, demo collection, conversion, baselines

docs.title: Get started
docs.text:
1. Install Galaxea DP and dependencies
  2. Collect or download data
  3. Train and evaluate

Tip: Use the top navigation tabs or search to jump directly to sections.

docs.title: 🤖 Galaxea DP
docs.text: GalaxeaDP is the open implementation of the diffusion policy algorithm, compatible with GalaxeaManipSim and GalaxeaLeRobot. It enables end-to-end pipelines for the Galaxea R1 series.

docs.title: ✨ Features
docs.text:
• Full simulation pipeline from data to evaluation
  • One-click scripts
  • LeRobot dataset format
  • Open-loop evaluation
  • EE and joint control modes

docs.title: 🚀 Installation
docs.text:
conda create -n opengalaxea python=3.10
conda activate opengalaxea

git clone https://github.com/OpenGalaxea/GalaxeaDP.git
cd GalaxeaDP
pip install -r requirements.txt

cd ..
git clone https://github.com/OpenGalaxea/GalaxeaManipSim.git
cd GalaxeaManipSim
pip install --no-deps -e .

cd ..
git clone https://github.com/OpenGalaxea/GalaxeaLeRobot.git
cd GalaxeaLeRobot
pip install --no-deps -e .

docs.title: ⚡ Quick Start
docs.text: bash scripts/sim_r1pro_blocks.sh

docs.title: 🛠 Data Generation & Conversion
docs.text:
• Collect demos in GalaxeaManipSim
  • Replay with IK to filter and collect images
  • Convert to LeRobot format
python -m galaxea_sim.scripts.collect_demos --env-name $env --num-demos 100 --datasets_dir data
python -m galaxea_sim.scripts.replay_demos --env-name $env --target_controller_type bimanual_relaxed_ik --num-demos 100 --dataset_dir data
python -m galaxea_sim.scripts.convert_single_galaxea_sim_to_galaxea_lerobot --task $env --tag replayed --robot r1_pro --use_eef --dataset_dir $dataset_dir

docs.title: Optional: Download Data/Models
docs.text:
# Data
gdown --folder https://drive.google.com/drive/folders/1qBY5OuTXrP3r1H8X9duUekyTEfgDFwvb
# Models
gdown --folder https://drive.google.com/drive/folders/1zWgMPXyWryNDz7pHTJzlwPjoszMGd3q1

docs.title: 🧠 Policy Sample
docs.text:
sample = dict(
    obs=dict(
        left_ee_pose=torch.Tensor(obs_size, 7),
        right_ee_pose=torch.Tensor(obs_size, 7),
        left_arm=torch.Tensor(obs_size, arm_size),
        right_arm=torch.Tensor(obs_size, arm_size),
        left_gripper=torch.Tensor(obs_size, 1),
        right_gripper=torch.Tensor(obs_size, 1),
        episode_start_left_ee_pose=torch.Tensor(1, 7),
        episode_start_right_ee_pose=torch.Tensor(1, 7),
        head_rgb=torch.Tensor(obs_size, 3, H, W),
        left_wrist_rgb=torch.Tensor(obs_size, 3, H, W),
        right_wrist_rgb=torch.Tensor(obs_size, 3, H, W),
    ),
    action=dict(
        left_ee_pose=torch.Tensor(chunk_size, 7),
        right_ee_pose=torch.Tensor(chunk_size, 7),
        left_arm=torch.Tensor(chunk_size, arm_size),
        right_arm=torch.Tensor(chunk_size, arm_size),
        left_gripper=torch.Tensor(chunk_size, 1),
        right_gripper=torch.Tensor(chunk_size, 1),
    ),
    gt_action=action,
)

docs.title: 🛠 Training
docs.text:
export GALAXEA_DP_WORK_DIR=out
bash train.sh trainer.devices=[0,1,2,3] task=sim/R1ProBlocksStackEasy_eef

docs.title: 📊 Evaluation
docs.text:
bash eval_lerobot.sh trainer.devices=[0] task=open_galaxea/<robot>/<task> \
  ckpt_path=out/open_galaxea/<robot>/<task>/<time>/checkpoints/step_20000.ckpt

bash eval_sim.sh trainer.devices=[0] task=sim/<task> \
  ckpt_path=out/sim/<task>/checkpoints/step_20000.ckpt

docs.title: 📂 Dataset (R1Pro example)
docs.text:
"observation.images.head_rgb": (360, 640, 3)
"observation.images.left_wrist_rgb": (480, 640, 3)
"observation.images.right_wrist_rgb": (480, 640, 3)
"observation.state.left_arm": (7,)
"observation.state.left_arm.velocities": (7,)
"observation.state.right_arm": (7,)
"observation.state.right_arm.velocities": (7,)
"observation.state.left_ee_pose": (7,)
"observation.state.right_ee_pose": (7,)
"observation.state.left_gripper": (1,)
"observation.state.right_gripper": (1,)
"observation.state.chassis": (3,)
"observation.state.chassis.velocities": (6,)
"observation.state.torso": (4,)
"observation.state.torso.velocities": (4,)
"action.left_ee_pose": (7,)
"action.right_ee_pose": (7,)
"action.left_arm": (7,)
"action.right_arm": (7,)
"action.left_gripper": (1,)
"action.right_gripper": (1,)

docs.title: 🤖 Galaxea Manipulation Simulator
docs.text: Provides simulation benchmarks, expert demo pipelines, and baseline policies for the Galaxea R1 series. Use it to collect demos, convert to LeRobot datasets, and train/evaluate Diffusion Policies.

docs.title: ✨ Features
docs.text:
• 30+ environments across 17 tasks
  • One-command setup and asset registration
  • Joint-space and relaxed-ik (EEF) controllers
  • LeRobot-compatible datasets
  • Baseline DP training and evaluation with videos/metrics

docs.title: 🚀 Installation (Standalone)
docs.text:
Prereq: Linux + CUDA GPU

conda create -n galaxea-sim python=3.10 -y
conda activate galaxea-sim
pip install -e .

# Install LeRobot
cd ..
git clone https://github.com/huggingface/lerobot.git
cd lerobot
git checkout a5e0aae13a3efd0080ac7ab6b461980d644014ab
pip install -e .
export PYTHONPATH="your_lerobot_codebase_path:$PYTHONPATH"

If installing together with Galaxea-DP, see the Galaxea DP installation.

Download assets:

gdown https://drive.google.com/file/d/1ZvtCv1H4FLrse_ElUWzsVDt8xRK4CyaC/
unzip robotwin_models.zip
mv robotwin_models galaxea_sim/assets/

Heads-up: If you hit datasets cache conflicts, clear ~/.cache/huggingface/datasets.

docs.title: 🎮 Collect Demos
docs.text: Supported robots, example tasks, and controllers: - R1: R1DualBottlesPickEasy — joint_position / relaxed_ik - R1 Pro: R1ProBlocksStackEasy — joint_position / relaxed_ik - R1 Lite: R1LiteBlocksStackEasy — joint_position

docs.title: 1) Generate raw demos (mplib)
docs.text:
python -m galaxea_sim.scripts.collect_demos --env-name R1DualBottlesPickEasy --num-demos 100
python -m galaxea_sim.scripts.collect_demos --env-name R1ProBlocksStackEasy --num-demos 100
python -m galaxea_sim.scripts.collect_demos --env-name R1LiteBlocksStackEasy --num-demos 100

Default --obs_mode is state. Data saved under datasets/<env-name>/<date-time>.

docs.title: 2) Replay demos with controllers
docs.text:
python -m galaxea_sim.scripts.replay_demos --env-name R1DualBottlesPickEasy --target_controller_type bimanual_joint_position --num-demos 100
python -m galaxea_sim.scripts.replay_demos --env-name R1ProBlocksStackEasy --target_controller_type bimanual_relaxed_ik --num-demos 100
python -m galaxea_sim.scripts.replay_demos --env-name R1LiteBlocksStackEasy --target_controller_type bimanual_joint_position --num-demos 100

Replay filters infeasible IK solutions, stores images/depths under datasets/<env-name>/final.

docs.title: Convert to LeRobot dataset
docs.text:
For Galaxea DP use convert_single_galaxea_sim_to_galaxea_lerobot (add --use_eef for relaxed_ik). For LeRobot DP use convert_single_galaxea_sim_to_lerobot.

# LeRobot DP examples
python -m galaxea_sim.scripts.convert_single_galaxea_sim_to_lerobot --task R1DualBottlesPickEasy --tag final --robot r1
python -m galaxea_sim.scripts.convert_single_galaxea_sim_to_lerobot --task R1ProBlocksStackEasy --tag final --robot r1_pro
python -m galaxea_sim.scripts.convert_single_galaxea_sim_to_lerobot --task R1LiteBlocksStackEasy --tag final --robot r1_lite

# EEF examples
python -m galaxea_sim.scripts.convert_single_galaxea_sim_to_lerobot --robot r1_pro --task R1ProDualBottlesPickEasy --tag final --use_eef
python -m galaxea_sim.scripts.convert_single_galaxea_sim_to_lerobot --robot r1_pro --task R1ProBlocksStackEasy --tag final --use_eef

Optional --use_video stores images as video. Ensure ffmpeg is installed; change vcodec to libx264 if needed in .../site-packages/lerobot/common/datasets/video_utils.py.

docs.title: Galaxea DP
docs.text:
# Images
observation.images.head_rgb: (224, 224, 3)
observation.images.left_wrist_rgb: (224, 224, 3)
observation.images.right_wrist_rgb: (224, 224, 3)
# Depth
observation.depth.head_depth: (224, 224)
# States/actions (EEF controller example; arm_dof=6 for R1/R1Lite, 7 for R1Pro)
observation.state.left_arm_joints: (arm_dof,)
observation.state.left_gripper: (1,)
observation.state.right_arm_joints: (arm_dof,)
observation.state.right_gripper: (1,)
action.left_arm_joints: (arm_dof,)
action.left_gripper: (1,)
action.right_arm_joints: (arm_dof,)
action.right_gripper: (1,)

docs.title: LeRobot DP
docs.text:
# Images
observation.images.rgb_head: (224, 224, 3)
observation.images.rgb_left_hand: (224, 224, 3)
observation.images.rgb_right_hand: (224, 224, 3)
# States/actions (EEF controller)
observation.state: (2*arm_dof + 2,)
action: (2*arm_dof + 2,)
# States/actions (joints controller)
observation.state: (16,)
action: (16,)

docs.title: Train and Evaluate
docs.text:
python -m galaxea_sim.scripts.train_lerobot_dp_policy --task R1DualBottlesPickEasy
python -m galaxea_sim.scripts.train_lerobot_dp_policy --task R1ProBlocksStackEasy
python -m galaxea_sim.scripts.train_lerobot_dp_policy --task R1LiteBlocksStackEasy

python -m galaxea_sim.scripts.eval_lerobot_dp_policy --task R1DualBottlesPickEasy --pretrained-policy-path outputs/train/R1DualBottlesPickEasy/diffusion/.../checkpoint --target_controller_type bimanual_joint_position
python -m galaxea_sim.scripts.eval_lerobot_dp_policy --task R1ProBlocksStackEasy --pretrained-policy-path outputs/train/R1ProBlocksStackEasy/diffusion/.../checkpoint --target_controller_type bimanual_joint_position
python -m galaxea_sim.scripts.eval_lerobot_dp_policy --task R1LiteBlocksStackEasy --pretrained-policy-path outputs/train/R1LiteBlocksStackEasy/diffusion/.../checkpoint --target_controller_type bimanual_joint_position

docs.title: 📈 Success Rate (100 rollouts; joints controller)
docs.text:
• R1 Dual Bottles Pick Easy: OpenDP 98%, LeRobot 98%
  • R1 Pro Blocks Stack Easy: OpenDP 68%, LeRobot 64%
  • R1 Lite Blocks Stack Easy: OpenDP 51%, LeRobot 42%

docs.title: Galaxea 文档
docs.text: 欢迎使用。这里介绍 Galaxea R1 系列的仿真、数据集与扩散策略。

docs.title: 快速入口
docs.text:
• Galaxea DP：端到端扩散策略训练/评估
  • Galaxea 模拟器：环境、演示收集、转换、基线

docs.title: 快速上手
docs.text:
1. 安装 Galaxea DP 及依赖
  2. 采集或下载数据
  3. 训练并评估

提示：使用顶部导航或搜索快速跳转。

docs.title: 🤖 Galaxea DP
docs.text: GalaxeaDP 是扩散策略算法的开源实现，兼容 GalaxeaManipSim 与 GalaxeaLeRobot，支持 Galaxea R1 系列的端到端流程。

docs.title: ✨ 特性
docs.text:
• 从数据到评估的完整仿真流程
  • 一键脚本
  • 兼容 LeRobot 数据集
  • 开环评估
  • 末端与关节两种控制模式

docs.title: 🚀 安装
docs.text:
conda create -n opengalaxea python=3.10
conda activate opengalaxea

git clone https://github.com/OpenGalaxea/GalaxeaDP.git
cd GalaxeaDP
pip install -r requirements.txt

cd ..
git clone https://github.com/OpenGalaxea/GalaxeaManipSim.git
cd GalaxeaManipSim
pip install --no-deps -e .

cd ..
git clone https://github.com/OpenGalaxea/GalaxeaLeRobot.git
cd GalaxeaLeRobot
pip install --no-deps -e .

docs.title: ⚡ 快速开始
docs.text: bash scripts/sim_r1pro_blocks.sh

docs.title: 🛠 数据生成与转换
docs.text:
• 在 GalaxeaManipSim 采集演示
  • 使用 IK 回放筛选并采集图像
  • 转换为 LeRobot 格式
python -m galaxea_sim.scripts.collect_demos --env-name $env --num-demos 100 --datasets_dir data
python -m galaxea_sim.scripts.replay_demos --env-name $env --target_controller_type bimanual_relaxed_ik --num-demos 100 --dataset_dir data
python -m galaxea_sim.scripts.convert_single_galaxea_sim_to_galaxea_lerobot --task $env --tag replayed --robot r1_pro --use_eef --dataset_dir $dataset_dir

docs.title: 可选：下载数据/模型
docs.text:
# 数据
gdown --folder https://drive.google.com/drive/folders/1qBY5OuTXrP3r1H8X9duUekyTEfgDFwvb
# 模型
gdown --folder https://drive.google.com/drive/folders/1zWgMPXyWryNDz7pHTJzlwPjoszMGd3q1

docs.title: 🧠 示例样本结构
docs.text:
sample = dict(
    obs=dict(
        left_ee_pose=torch.Tensor(obs_size, 7),
        right_ee_pose=torch.Tensor(obs_size, 7),
        left_arm=torch.Tensor(obs_size, arm_size),
        right_arm=torch.Tensor(obs_size, arm_size),
        left_gripper=torch.Tensor(obs_size, 1),
        right_gripper=torch.Tensor(obs_size, 1),
        episode_start_left_ee_pose=torch.Tensor(1, 7),
        episode_start_right_ee_pose=torch.Tensor(1, 7),
        head_rgb=torch.Tensor(obs_size, 3, H, W),
        left_wrist_rgb=torch.Tensor(obs_size, 3, H, W),
        right_wrist_rgb=torch.Tensor(obs_size, 3, H, W),
    ),
    action=dict(
        left_ee_pose=torch.Tensor(chunk_size, 7),
        right_ee_pose=torch.Tensor(chunk_size, 7),
        left_arm=torch.Tensor(chunk_size, arm_size),
        right_arm=torch.Tensor(chunk_size, arm_size),
        left_gripper=torch.Tensor(chunk_size, 1),
        right_gripper=torch.Tensor(chunk_size, 1),
    ),
    gt_action=action,
)

docs.title: 🛠 训练
docs.text:
export GALAXEA_DP_WORK_DIR=out
bash train.sh trainer.devices=[0,1,2,3] task=sim/R1ProBlocksStackEasy_eef

docs.title: 📊 评估
docs.text:
bash eval_lerobot.sh trainer.devices=[0] task=open_galaxea/<robot>/<task> \
  ckpt_path=out/open_galaxea/<robot>/<task>/<time>/checkpoints/step_20000.ckpt

bash eval_sim.sh trainer.devices=[0] task=sim/<task> \
  ckpt_path=out/sim/<task>/checkpoints/step_20000.ckpt

docs.title: 📂 数据集（以 R1Pro 为例）
docs.text:
"observation.images.head_rgb": (360, 640, 3)

"observation.state.left_arm": (7,)
"observation.state.left_arm.velocities": (7,)
"observation.state.right_arm": (7,)
"observation.state.right_arm.velocities": (7,)
"observation.state.left_ee_pose": (7,)
"observation.state.right_ee_pose": (7,)
"observation.state.left_gripper": (1,)
"observation.state.right_gripper": (1,)
"observation.state.chassis": (3,)
"observation.state.chassis.velocities": (6,)
"observation.state.torso": (4,)
"observation.state.torso.velocities": (4,)

"action.right_ee_pose": (7,)

"action.right_arm": (7,)

"action.right_gripper": (1,)

docs.title: 许可与致谢
docs.text:
• MIT 许可
  • 致谢 Diffusion Policy、LeRobot、Robotwin

@inproceedings{GalaxeaDP,
  title={Galaxea Diffusion Policy},

docs.title: 🤖 Galaxea 操作仿真器
docs.text: 提供仿真基准、专家演示流水线与基线策略，适用于 Galaxea R1 系列。用于收集高质量演示、转换为 LeRobot 数据集，并训练/评估扩散策略。

docs.title: ✨ 特性
docs.text:
• 覆盖 30+ 环境，17 类任务
  • 一键安装与资产注册
  • 关节空间与 relaxed-ik（末端）控制器
  • 兼容 LeRobot 数据集
  • 基线 DP 训练与评估（含视频/指标）

docs.title: 🚀 安装（独立）
docs.text:
前置：Linux + CUDA GPU

conda create -n galaxea-sim python=3.10 -y
conda activate galaxea-sim
pip install -e .

# 安装 LeRobot
cd ..
git clone https://github.com/huggingface/lerobot.git
cd lerobot
git checkout a5e0aae13a3efd0080ac7ab6b461980d644014ab
pip install -e .
export PYTHONPATH="your_lerobot_codebase_path:$PYTHONPATH"

与 Galaxea DP 一起安装时，请参考 Galaxea DP 安装说明。

下载资产：

gdown https://drive.google.com/file/d/1ZvtCv1H4FLrse_ElUWzsVDt8xRK4CyaC/
unzip robotwin_models.zip
mv robotwin_models galaxea_sim/assets/

若遇到 datasets 包缓存冲突，请清理 ~/.cache/huggingface/datasets。

docs.title: 🎮 采集演示
docs.text: 支持： - R1：R1DualBottlesPickEasy — 关节/relaxed_ik - R1 Pro：R1ProBlocksStackEasy — 关节/relaxed_ik - R1 Lite：R1LiteBlocksStackEasy — 关节

docs.title: 1) 生成原始演示（mplib）
docs.text:
python -m galaxea_sim.scripts.collect_demos --env-name R1DualBottlesPickEasy --num-demos 100
python -m galaxea_sim.scripts.collect_demos --env-name R1ProBlocksStackEasy --num-demos 100
python -m galaxea_sim.scripts.collect_demos --env-name R1LiteBlocksStackEasy --num-demos 100

默认 --obs_mode=state，数据保存在 datasets/<env-name>/<date-time>。

docs.title: 2) 指定控制器回放
docs.text:
python -m galaxea_sim.scripts.replay_demos --env-name R1DualBottlesPickEasy --target_controller_type bimanual_joint_position --num-demos 100
python -m galaxea_sim.scripts.replay_demos --env-name R1ProBlocksStackEasy --target_controller_type bimanual_relaxed_ik --num-demos 100
python -m galaxea_sim.scripts.replay_demos --env-name R1LiteBlocksStackEasy --target_controller_type bimanual_joint_position --num-demos 100

回放将过滤无 IK 解的轨迹，并保存图像/深度至 datasets/<env-name>/final。

docs.title: 转换为 LeRobot 数据集
docs.text:
Galaxea DP 使用 convert_single_galaxea_sim_to_galaxea_lerobot（relaxed_ik 需加 --use_eef）。LeRobot DP 使用 convert_single_galaxea_sim_to_lerobot。

# LeRobot DP 示例
python -m galaxea_sim.scripts.convert_single_galaxea_sim_to_lerobot --task R1DualBottlesPickEasy --tag final --robot r1
python -m galaxea_sim.scripts.convert_single_galaxea_sim_to_lerobot --task R1ProBlocksStackEasy --tag final --robot r1_pro
python -m galaxea_sim.scripts.convert_single_galaxea_sim_to_lerobot --task R1LiteBlocksStackEasy --tag final --robot r1_lite

# 末端控制示例
python -m galaxea_sim.scripts.convert_single_galaxea_sim_to_lerobot --robot r1_pro --task R1ProDualBottlesPickEasy --tag final --use_eef
python -m galaxea_sim.scripts.convert_single_galaxea_sim_to_lerobot --robot r1_pro --task R1ProBlocksStackEasy --tag final --use_eef

可选 --use_video 将图像存为视频；需安装 ffmpeg，必要时在 .../site-packages/lerobot/common/datasets/video_utils.py 中将 vcodec 改为 libx264。

docs.title: Galaxea DP
docs.text:
# 图像
observation.images.head_rgb: (224, 224, 3)
observation.images.left_wrist_rgb: (224, 224, 3)
observation.images.right_wrist_rgb: (224, 224, 3)
# 深度
observation.depth.head_depth: (224, 224)
# 状态/动作（EEF 控制；arm_dof：R1/R1Lite=6，R1Pro=7）
observation.state.left_arm_joints: (arm_dof,)
observation.state.left_gripper: (1,)
observation.state.right_arm_joints: (arm_dof,)
observation.state.right_gripper: (1,)
action.left_arm_joints: (arm_dof,)
action.left_gripper: (1,)
action.right_arm_joints: (arm_dof,)
action.right_gripper: (1,)

docs.title: LeRobot DP
docs.text:
# 图像
observation.images.rgb_head: (224, 224, 3)
observation.images.rgb_left_hand: (224, 224, 3)
observation.images.rgb_right_hand: (224, 224, 3)
# 状态/动作（EEF 控制）
observation.state: (2*arm_dof + 2,)
action: (2*arm_dof + 2,)
# 状态/动作（关节控制）
observation.state: (16,)
action: (16,)

docs.title: 训练与评估
docs.text:
python -m galaxea_sim.scripts.train_lerobot_dp_policy --task R1DualBottlesPickEasy
python -m galaxea_sim.scripts.train_lerobot_dp_policy --task R1ProBlocksStackEasy
python -m galaxea_sim.scripts.train_lerobot_dp_policy --task R1LiteBlocksStackEasy

python -m galaxea_sim.scripts.eval_lerobot_dp_policy --task R1DualBottlesPickEasy --pretrained-policy-path outputs/train/R1DualBottlesPickEasy/diffusion/.../checkpoint --target_controller_type bimanual_joint_position
python -m galaxea_sim.scripts.eval_lerobot_dp_policy --task R1ProBlocksStackEasy --pretrained-policy-path outputs/train/R1ProBlocksStackEasy/diffusion/.../checkpoint --target_controller_type bimanual_joint_position
python -m galaxea_sim.scripts.eval_lerobot_dp_policy --task R1LiteBlocksStackEasy --pretrained-policy-path outputs/train/R1LiteBlocksStackEasy/diffusion/.../checkpoint --target_controller_type bimanual_joint_position

  • 致谢 Diffusion Policy、LeRobot、Robotwin

docs.title: Galaxea 文档
docs.text: 欢迎使用。这里介绍 Galaxea R1 系列的仿真、数据集与扩散策略。

docs.title: 快速入口
docs.text:
• Galaxea DP：端到端扩散策略训练/评估
  • Galaxea 模拟器：环境、演示收集、转换、基线

docs.title: 快速上手
docs.text:
1. 安装 Galaxea DP 及依赖
  2. 采集或下载数据
  3. 训练并评估

提示：使用顶部导航或搜索快速跳转。

docs.title: 🤖 Galaxea DP
docs.text: GalaxeaDP 是扩散策略算法的开源实现，兼容 GalaxeaManipSim 与 GalaxeaLeRobot，支持 Galaxea R1 系列的端到端流程。

docs.title: ✨ 特性
docs.text:
• 从数据到评估的完整仿真流程
  • 一键脚本
  • 兼容 LeRobot 数据集
  • 开环评估
  • 末端与关节两种控制模式

docs.title: 🚀 安装
docs.text:
conda create -n opengalaxea python=3.10
conda activate opengalaxea

git clone https://github.com/OpenGalaxea/GalaxeaDP.git
cd GalaxeaDP
pip install -r requirements.txt

cd ..
git clone https://github.com/OpenGalaxea/GalaxeaManipSim.git
cd GalaxeaManipSim
pip install --no-deps -e .

cd ..
git clone https://github.com/OpenGalaxea/GalaxeaLeRobot.git
cd GalaxeaLeRobot
pip install --no-deps -e .

docs.title: ⚡ 快速开始
docs.text: bash scripts/sim_r1pro_blocks.sh

docs.title: 🛠 数据生成与转换
docs.text:
• 在 GalaxeaManipSim 采集演示
  • 使用 IK 回放筛选并采集图像
  • 转换为 LeRobot 格式
python -m galaxea_sim.scripts.collect_demos --env-name $env --num-demos 100 --datasets_dir data
python -m galaxea_sim.scripts.replay_demos --env-name $env --target_controller_type bimanual_relaxed_ik --num-demos 100 --dataset_dir data
python -m galaxea_sim.scripts.convert_single_galaxea_sim_to_galaxea_lerobot --task $env --tag replayed --robot r1_pro --use_eef --dataset_dir $dataset_dir

docs.title: 可选：下载数据/模型
docs.text:
# 数据
gdown --folder https://drive.google.com/drive/folders/1qBY5OuTXrP3r1H8X9duUekyTEfgDFwvb
# 模型
gdown --folder https://drive.google.com/drive/folders/1zWgMPXyWryNDz7pHTJzlwPjoszMGd3q1

docs.title: 🧠 示例样本结构
docs.text:
sample = dict(
    obs=dict(
        left_ee_pose=torch.Tensor(obs_size, 7),
        right_ee_pose=torch.Tensor(obs_size, 7),
        left_arm=torch.Tensor(obs_size, arm_size),
        right_arm=torch.Tensor(obs_size, arm_size),
        left_gripper=torch.Tensor(obs_size, 1),
        right_gripper=torch.Tensor(obs_size, 1),
        episode_start_left_ee_pose=torch.Tensor(1, 7),
        episode_start_right_ee_pose=torch.Tensor(1, 7),
        head_rgb=torch.Tensor(obs_size, 3, H, W),
        left_wrist_rgb=torch.Tensor(obs_size, 3, H, W),
        right_wrist_rgb=torch.Tensor(obs_size, 3, H, W),
    ),
    action=dict(
        left_ee_pose=torch.Tensor(chunk_size, 7),
        right_ee_pose=torch.Tensor(chunk_size, 7),
        left_arm=torch.Tensor(chunk_size, arm_size),
        right_arm=torch.Tensor(chunk_size, arm_size),
        left_gripper=torch.Tensor(chunk_size, 1),
        right_gripper=torch.Tensor(chunk_size, 1),
    ),
    gt_action=action,
)

docs.title: 🛠 训练
docs.text:
export GALAXEA_DP_WORK_DIR=out
bash train.sh trainer.devices=[0,1,2,3] task=sim/R1ProBlocksStackEasy_eef

docs.title: 📊 评估
docs.text:
bash eval_lerobot.sh trainer.devices=[0] task=open_galaxea/<robot>/<task> \
  ckpt_path=out/open_galaxea/<robot>/<task>/<time>/checkpoints/step_20000.ckpt

bash eval_sim.sh trainer.devices=[0] task=sim/<task> \
  ckpt_path=out/sim/<task>/checkpoints/step_20000.ckpt

docs.title: 📂 数据集（以 R1Pro 为例）
docs.text:
"observation.images.head_rgb": (360, 640, 3)
"observation.images.left_wrist_rgb": (480, 640, 3)
"observation.images.right_wrist_rgb": (480, 640, 3)
"observation.state.left_arm": (7,)
"observation.state.left_arm.velocities": (7,)
"observation.state.right_arm": (7,)
"observation.state.right_arm.velocities": (7,)
"observation.state.left_ee_pose": (7,)
"observation.state.right_ee_pose": (7,)
"observation.state.left_gripper": (1,)
"observation.state.right_gripper": (1,)
"observation.state.chassis": (3,)
"observation.state.chassis.velocities": (6,)
"observation.state.torso": (4,)
"observation.state.torso.velocities": (4,)
"action.left_ee_pose": (7,)
"action.right_ee_pose": (7,)
"action.left_arm": (7,)
"action.right_arm": (7,)
"action.left_gripper": (1,)
"action.right_gripper": (1,)

docs.title: 许可与致谢
docs.text:
• MIT 许可
  • 致谢 Diffusion Policy、LeRobot、Robotwin

docs.title: 引用
docs.text:
@inproceedings{GalaxeaDP,
  title={Galaxea Diffusion Policy},
  author={Galaxea Team},
  year={2025}
}

docs.title: 🤖 Galaxea 操作仿真器
docs.text: 提供仿真基准、专家演示流水线与基线策略，适用于 Galaxea R1 系列。用于收集高质量演示、转换为 LeRobot 数据集，并训练/评估扩散策略。

docs.title: ✨ 特性
docs.text:
• 覆盖 30+ 环境，17 类任务
  • 一键安装与资产注册
  • 关节空间与 relaxed-ik（末端）控制器
  • 兼容 LeRobot 数据集
  • 基线 DP 训练与评估（含视频/指标）

docs.title: 🚀 安装（独立）
docs.text:
前置：Linux + CUDA GPU

conda create -n galaxea-sim python=3.10 -y
conda activate galaxea-sim
pip install -e .

# 安装 LeRobot
cd ..
git clone https://github.com/huggingface/lerobot.git
cd lerobot
git checkout a5e0aae13a3efd0080ac7ab6b461980d644014ab
pip install -e .
export PYTHONPATH="your_lerobot_codebase_path:$PYTHONPATH"

与 Galaxea DP 一起安装时，请参考 Galaxea DP 安装说明。

下载资产：

gdown https://drive.google.com/file/d/1ZvtCv1H4FLrse_ElUWzsVDt8xRK4CyaC/
unzip robotwin_models.zip
mv robotwin_models galaxea_sim/assets/

若遇到 datasets 包缓存冲突，请清理 ~/.cache/huggingface/datasets。

docs.title: 🎮 采集演示
docs.text: 支持： - R1：R1DualBottlesPickEasy — 关节/relaxed_ik - R1 Pro：R1ProBlocksStackEasy — 关节/relaxed_ik - R1 Lite：R1LiteBlocksStackEasy — 关节

docs.title: 1) 生成原始演示（mplib）
docs.text:
python -m galaxea_sim.scripts.collect_demos --env-name R1DualBottlesPickEasy --num-demos 100
python -m galaxea_sim.scripts.collect_demos --env-name R1ProBlocksStackEasy --num-demos 100
python -m galaxea_sim.scripts.collect_demos --env-name R1LiteBlocksStackEasy --num-demos 100

默认 --obs_mode=state，数据保存在 datasets/<env-name>/<date-time>。

docs.title: 2) 指定控制器回放
docs.text:
python -m galaxea_sim.scripts.replay_demos --env-name R1DualBottlesPickEasy --target_controller_type bimanual_joint_position --num-demos 100
python -m galaxea_sim.scripts.replay_demos --env-name R1ProBlocksStackEasy --target_controller_type bimanual_relaxed_ik --num-demos 100
python -m galaxea_sim.scripts.replay_demos --env-name R1LiteBlocksStackEasy --target_controller_type bimanual_joint_position --num-demos 100

回放将过滤无 IK 解的轨迹，并保存图像/深度至 datasets/<env-name>/final。

docs.title: 转换为 LeRobot 数据集
docs.text:
Galaxea DP 使用 convert_single_galaxea_sim_to_galaxea_lerobot（relaxed_ik 需加 --use_eef）。LeRobot DP 使用 convert_single_galaxea_sim_to_lerobot。

# LeRobot DP 示例
python -m galaxea_sim.scripts.convert_single_galaxea_sim_to_lerobot --task R1DualBottlesPickEasy --tag final --robot r1
python -m galaxea_sim.scripts.convert_single_galaxea_sim_to_lerobot --task R1ProBlocksStackEasy --tag final --robot r1_pro
python -m galaxea_sim.scripts.convert_single_galaxea_sim_to_lerobot --task R1LiteBlocksStackEasy --tag final --robot r1_lite

# 末端控制示例
python -m galaxea_sim.scripts.convert_single_galaxea_sim_to_lerobot --robot r1_pro --task R1ProDualBottlesPickEasy --tag final --use_eef
python -m galaxea_sim.scripts.convert_single_galaxea_sim_to_lerobot --robot r1_pro --task R1ProBlocksStackEasy --tag final --use_eef

可选 --use_video 将图像存为视频；需安装 ffmpeg，必要时在 .../site-packages/lerobot/common/datasets/video_utils.py 中将 vcodec 改为 libx264。

docs.title: Galaxea DP
docs.text:
# 图像
observation.images.head_rgb: (224, 224, 3)
observation.images.left_wrist_rgb: (224, 224, 3)
observation.images.right_wrist_rgb: (224, 224, 3)
# 深度
observation.depth.head_depth: (224, 224)
# 状态/动作（EEF 控制；arm_dof：R1/R1Lite=6，R1Pro=7）
observation.state.left_arm_joints: (arm_dof,)
observation.state.left_gripper: (1,)
observation.state.right_arm_joints: (arm_dof,)
observation.state.right_gripper: (1,)
action.left_arm_joints: (arm_dof,)
action.left_gripper: (1,)
action.right_arm_joints: (arm_dof,)
action.right_gripper: (1,)

docs.title: LeRobot DP
docs.text:
# 图像
observation.images.rgb_head: (224, 224, 3)
observation.images.rgb_left_hand: (224, 224, 3)
observation.images.rgb_right_hand: (224, 224, 3)
# 状态/动作（EEF 控制）
observation.state: (2*arm_dof + 2,)
action: (2*arm_dof + 2,)
# 状态/动作（关节控制）
observation.state: (16,)
action: (16,)

docs.title: 训练与评估
docs.text:
python -m galaxea_sim.scripts.train_lerobot_dp_policy --task R1DualBottlesPickEasy
python -m galaxea_sim.scripts.train_lerobot_dp_policy --task R1ProBlocksStackEasy
python -m galaxea_sim.scripts.train_lerobot_dp_policy --task R1LiteBlocksStackEasy

python -m galaxea_sim.scripts.eval_lerobot_dp_policy --task R1DualBottlesPickEasy --pretrained-policy-path outputs/train/R1DualBottlesPickEasy/diffusion/.../checkpoint --target_controller_type bimanual_joint_position
python -m galaxea_sim.scripts.eval_lerobot_dp_policy --task R1ProBlocksStackEasy --pretrained-policy-path outputs/train/R1ProBlocksStackEasy/diffusion/.../checkpoint --target_controller_type bimanual_joint_position
python -m galaxea_sim.scripts.eval_lerobot_dp_policy --task R1LiteBlocksStackEasy --pretrained-policy-path outputs/train/R1LiteBlocksStackEasy/diffusion/.../checkpoint --target_controller_type bimanual_joint_position

docs.title: 许可与致谢
docs.text:
• MIT 许可
  • 致谢 Diffusion Policy、LeRobot、Robotwin

docs.title: 引用
docs.text:
@inproceedings{GalaxeaManipSim,
  title={Galaxea Manipulation Simulator},

docs.title: Galaxea Documentation
docs.text: Welcome. Explore simulation, datasets, and diffusion policies for the Galaxea R1 series.

docs.title: Quick links
docs.text:
• Galaxea DP: end-to-end diffusion policy pipeline
  • Galaxea Manipulation Simulator: environments, demo collection, conversion, baselines

docs.title: Get started
docs.text:
1. Install Galaxea DP and dependencies
  2. Collect or download data
  3. Train and evaluate

Tip: Use the top navigation tabs or search to jump directly to sections.

docs.title: 🤖 Galaxea DP
docs.text: GalaxeaDP is the open implementation of the diffusion policy algorithm, compatible with GalaxeaManipSim and GalaxeaLeRobot. It enables end-to-end pipelines for the Galaxea R1 series.

docs.title: ✨ Features
docs.text:
• Full simulation pipeline from data to evaluation
  • One-click scripts
  • LeRobot dataset format
  • Open-loop evaluation
  • EE and joint control modes

docs.title: 🚀 Installation
docs.text:
conda create -n opengalaxea python=3.10
conda activate opengalaxea

git clone https://github.com/OpenGalaxea/GalaxeaDP.git
cd GalaxeaDP
pip install -r requirements.txt

cd ..
git clone https://github.com/OpenGalaxea/GalaxeaManipSim.git
cd GalaxeaManipSim
pip install --no-deps -e .

cd ..
git clone https://github.com/OpenGalaxea/GalaxeaLeRobot.git
cd GalaxeaLeRobot
pip install --no-deps -e .

docs.title: ⚡ Quick Start
docs.text: bash scripts/sim_r1pro_blocks.sh

docs.title: 🛠 Data Generation & Conversion
docs.text:
• Collect demos in GalaxeaManipSim
  • Replay with IK to filter and collect images
  • Convert to LeRobot format
python -m galaxea_sim.scripts.collect_demos --env-name $env --num-demos 100 --datasets_dir data
python -m galaxea_sim.scripts.replay_demos --env-name $env --target_controller_type bimanual_relaxed_ik --num-demos 100 --dataset_dir data
python -m galaxea_sim.scripts.convert_single_galaxea_sim_to_galaxea_lerobot --task $env --tag replayed --robot r1_pro --use_eef --dataset_dir $dataset_dir

docs.title: Optional: Download Data/Models
docs.text:
# Data
gdown --folder https://drive.google.com/drive/folders/1qBY5OuTXrP3r1H8X9duUekyTEfgDFwvb
# Models
gdown --folder https://drive.google.com/drive/folders/1zWgMPXyWryNDz7pHTJzlwPjoszMGd3q1

docs.title: 🧠 Policy Sample
docs.text:
sample = dict(
    obs=dict(
        left_ee_pose=torch.Tensor(obs_size, 7),
        right_ee_pose=torch.Tensor(obs_size, 7),
        left_arm=torch.Tensor(obs_size, arm_size),
        right_arm=torch.Tensor(obs_size, arm_size),
        left_gripper=torch.Tensor(obs_size, 1),
        right_gripper=torch.Tensor(obs_size, 1),
        episode_start_left_ee_pose=torch.Tensor(1, 7),
        episode_start_right_ee_pose=torch.Tensor(1, 7),
        head_rgb=torch.Tensor(obs_size, 3, H, W),
        left_wrist_rgb=torch.Tensor(obs_size, 3, H, W),
        right_wrist_rgb=torch.Tensor(obs_size, 3, H, W),
    ),
    action=dict(
        left_ee_pose=torch.Tensor(chunk_size, 7),
        right_ee_pose=torch.Tensor(chunk_size, 7),
        left_arm=torch.Tensor(chunk_size, arm_size),
        right_arm=torch.Tensor(chunk_size, arm_size),
        left_gripper=torch.Tensor(chunk_size, 1),
        right_gripper=torch.Tensor(chunk_size, 1),
    ),
    gt_action=action,
)

docs.title: 🛠 Training
docs.text:
export GALAXEA_DP_WORK_DIR=out
bash train.sh trainer.devices=[0,1,2,3] task=sim/R1ProBlocksStackEasy_eef

docs.title: 📊 Evaluation
docs.text:
bash eval_lerobot.sh trainer.devices=[0] task=open_galaxea/<robot>/<task> \
  ckpt_path=out/open_galaxea/<robot>/<task>/<time>/checkpoints/step_20000.ckpt

bash eval_sim.sh trainer.devices=[0] task=sim/<task> \
  ckpt_path=out/sim/<task>/checkpoints/step_20000.ckpt

docs.title: 📂 Dataset (R1Pro example)
docs.text:
"observation.images.head_rgb": (360, 640, 3)
"observation.images.left_wrist_rgb": (480, 640, 3)
"observation.images.right_wrist_rgb": (480, 640, 3)
"observation.state.left_arm": (7,)
"observation.state.left_arm.velocities": (7,)
"observation.state.right_arm": (7,)
"observation.state.right_arm.velocities": (7,)
"observation.state.left_ee_pose": (7,)
"observation.state.right_ee_pose": (7,)
"observation.state.left_gripper": (1,)
"observation.state.right_gripper": (1,)
"observation.state.chassis": (3,)
"observation.state.chassis.velocities": (6,)
"observation.state.torso": (4,)
"observation.state.torso.velocities": (4,)
"action.left_ee_pose": (7,)
"action.right_ee_pose": (7,)
"action.left_arm": (7,)
"action.right_arm": (7,)
"action.left_gripper": (1,)
"action.right_gripper": (1,)

docs.title: License & Acknowledgements
docs.text:
• MIT License
  • Built on Diffusion Policy, LeRobot, Robotwin

docs.title: Citation
docs.text:
@inproceedings{GalaxeaDP,
  title={Galaxea Diffusion Policy},
  author={Galaxea Team},
  year={2025}
}

docs.title: 🤖 Galaxea Manipulation Simulator
docs.text: Provides simulation benchmarks, expert demo pipelines, and baseline policies for the Galaxea R1 series. Use it to collect demos, convert to LeRobot datasets, and train/evaluate Diffusion Policies.

docs.title: ✨ Features
docs.text:
• 30+ environments across 17 tasks
  • One-command setup and asset registration
  • Joint-space and relaxed-ik (EEF) controllers
  • LeRobot-compatible datasets
  • Baseline DP training and evaluation with videos/metrics

docs.title: 🚀 Installation (Standalone)
docs.text:
Prereq: Linux + CUDA GPU

conda create -n galaxea-sim python=3.10 -y
conda activate galaxea-sim
pip install -e .

# Install LeRobot
cd ..
git clone https://github.com/huggingface/lerobot.git
cd lerobot
git checkout a5e0aae13a3efd0080ac7ab6b461980d644014ab
pip install -e .
export PYTHONPATH="your_lerobot_codebase_path:$PYTHONPATH"

If installing together with Galaxea-DP, see the Galaxea DP installation.

Download assets:

gdown https://drive.google.com/file/d/1ZvtCv1H4FLrse_ElUWzsVDt8xRK4CyaC/
unzip robotwin_models.zip
mv robotwin_models galaxea_sim/assets/

Heads-up: If you hit datasets cache conflicts, clear ~/.cache/huggingface/datasets.

docs.title: 🎮 Collect Demos
docs.text: Supported robots, example tasks, and controllers: - R1: R1DualBottlesPickEasy — joint_position / relaxed_ik - R1 Pro: R1ProBlocksStackEasy — joint_position / relaxed_ik - R1 Lite: R1LiteBlocksStackEasy — joint_position

docs.title: 1) Generate raw demos (mplib)
docs.text:
python -m galaxea_sim.scripts.collect_demos --env-name R1DualBottlesPickEasy --num-demos 100
python -m galaxea_sim.scripts.collect_demos --env-name R1ProBlocksStackEasy --num-demos 100
python -m galaxea_sim.scripts.collect_demos --env-name R1LiteBlocksStackEasy --num-demos 100

Default --obs_mode is state. Data saved under datasets/<env-name>/<date-time>.

docs.title: 2) Replay demos with controllers
docs.text:
python -m galaxea_sim.scripts.replay_demos --env-name R1DualBottlesPickEasy --target_controller_type bimanual_joint_position --num-demos 100
python -m galaxea_sim.scripts.replay_demos --env-name R1ProBlocksStackEasy --target_controller_type bimanual_relaxed_ik --num-demos 100
python -m galaxea_sim.scripts.replay_demos --env-name R1LiteBlocksStackEasy --target_controller_type bimanual_joint_position --num-demos 100

Replay filters infeasible IK solutions, stores images/depths under datasets/<env-name>/final.

docs.title: Convert to LeRobot dataset
docs.text:
For Galaxea DP use convert_single_galaxea_sim_to_galaxea_lerobot (add --use_eef for relaxed_ik). For LeRobot DP use convert_single_galaxea_sim_to_lerobot.

# LeRobot DP examples
python -m galaxea_sim.scripts.convert_single_galaxea_sim_to_lerobot --task R1DualBottlesPickEasy --tag final --robot r1
python -m galaxea_sim.scripts.convert_single_galaxea_sim_to_lerobot --task R1ProBlocksStackEasy --tag final --robot r1_pro
python -m galaxea_sim.scripts.convert_single_galaxea_sim_to_lerobot --task R1LiteBlocksStackEasy --tag final --robot r1_lite

# EEF examples
python -m galaxea_sim.scripts.convert_single_galaxea_sim_to_lerobot --robot r1_pro --task R1ProDualBottlesPickEasy --tag final --use_eef
python -m galaxea_sim.scripts.convert_single_galaxea_sim_to_lerobot --robot r1_pro --task R1ProBlocksStackEasy --tag final --use_eef

Optional --use_video stores images as video. Ensure ffmpeg is installed; change vcodec to libx264 if needed in .../site-packages/lerobot/common/datasets/video_utils.py.

docs.title: Galaxea DP
docs.text:
# Images
observation.images.head_rgb: (224, 224, 3)
observation.images.left_wrist_rgb: (224, 224, 3)
observation.images.right_wrist_rgb: (224, 224, 3)
# Depth
observation.depth.head_depth: (224, 224)
# States/actions (EEF controller example; arm_dof=6 for R1/R1Lite, 7 for R1Pro)
observation.state.left_arm_joints: (arm_dof,)
observation.state.left_gripper: (1,)
observation.state.right_arm_joints: (arm_dof,)
observation.state.right_gripper: (1,)
action.left_arm_joints: (arm_dof,)
action.left_gripper: (1,)
action.right_arm_joints: (arm_dof,)
action.right_gripper: (1,)

docs.title: LeRobot DP
docs.text:
# Images
observation.images.rgb_head: (224, 224, 3)
observation.images.rgb_left_hand: (224, 224, 3)
observation.images.rgb_right_hand: (224, 224, 3)
# States/actions (EEF controller)
observation.state: (2*arm_dof + 2,)
action: (2*arm_dof + 2,)
# States/actions (joints controller)
observation.state: (16,)
action: (16,)

docs.title: Train and Evaluate
docs.text:
python -m galaxea_sim.scripts.train_lerobot_dp_policy --task R1DualBottlesPickEasy
python -m galaxea_sim.scripts.train_lerobot_dp_policy --task R1ProBlocksStackEasy
python -m galaxea_sim.scripts.train_lerobot_dp_policy --task R1LiteBlocksStackEasy

python -m galaxea_sim.scripts.eval_lerobot_dp_policy --task R1DualBottlesPickEasy --pretrained-policy-path outputs/train/R1DualBottlesPickEasy/diffusion/.../checkpoint --target_controller_type bimanual_joint_position
python -m galaxea_sim.scripts.eval_lerobot_dp_policy --task R1ProBlocksStackEasy --pretrained-policy-path outputs/train/R1ProBlocksStackEasy/diffusion/.../checkpoint --target_controller_type bimanual_joint_position
python -m galaxea_sim.scripts.eval_lerobot_dp_policy --task R1LiteBlocksStackEasy --pretrained-policy-path outputs/train/R1LiteBlocksStackEasy/diffusion/.../checkpoint --target_controller_type bimanual_joint_position

docs.title: 📈 Success Rate (100 rollouts; joints controller)
docs.text:
• R1 Dual Bottles Pick Easy: OpenDP 98%, LeRobot 98%
  • R1 Pro Blocks Stack Easy: OpenDP 68%, LeRobot 64%
  • R1 Lite Blocks Stack Easy: OpenDP 51%, LeRobot 42%

docs.title: Galaxea 文档
docs.text: 欢迎使用。这里介绍 Galaxea R1 系列的仿真、数据集与扩散策略。

docs.title: 快速入口
docs.text:
• Galaxea DP：端到端扩散策略训练/评估
  • Galaxea 模拟器：环境、演示收集、转换、基线

docs.title: 快速上手
docs.text:
1. 安装 Galaxea DP 及依赖
  2. 采集或下载数据
  3. 训练并评估

提示：使用顶部导航或搜索快速跳转。

docs.title: 🤖 Galaxea DP
docs.text: GalaxeaDP 是扩散策略算法的开源实现，兼容 GalaxeaManipSim 与 GalaxeaLeRobot，支持 Galaxea R1 系列的端到端流程。

docs.title: ✨ 特性
docs.text:
• 从数据到评估的完整仿真流程
  • 一键脚本
  • 兼容 LeRobot 数据集
  • 开环评估
  • 末端与关节两种控制模式

docs.title: 🚀 安装
docs.text:
conda create -n opengalaxea python=3.10
conda activate opengalaxea

git clone https://github.com/OpenGalaxea/GalaxeaDP.git
cd GalaxeaDP
pip install -r requirements.txt

cd ..
git clone https://github.com/OpenGalaxea/GalaxeaManipSim.git
cd GalaxeaManipSim
pip install --no-deps -e .

cd ..
git clone https://github.com/OpenGalaxea/GalaxeaLeRobot.git
cd GalaxeaLeRobot
pip install --no-deps -e .

docs.title: ⚡ 快速开始
docs.text: bash scripts/sim_r1pro_blocks.sh

docs.title: 🛠 数据生成与转换
docs.text:
• 在 GalaxeaManipSim 采集演示
  • 使用 IK 回放筛选并采集图像
  • 转换为 LeRobot 格式
python -m galaxea_sim.scripts.collect_demos --env-name $env --num-demos 100 --datasets_dir data
python -m galaxea_sim.scripts.replay_demos --env-name $env --target_controller_type bimanual_relaxed_ik --num-demos 100 --dataset_dir data
python -m galaxea_sim.scripts.convert_single_galaxea_sim_to_galaxea_lerobot --task $env --tag replayed --robot r1_pro --use_eef --dataset_dir $dataset_dir

docs.title: 可选：下载数据/模型
docs.text:
# 数据
gdown --folder https://drive.google.com/drive/folders/1qBY5OuTXrP3r1H8X9duUekyTEfgDFwvb
# 模型
gdown --folder https://drive.google.com/drive/folders/1zWgMPXyWryNDz7pHTJzlwPjoszMGd3q1

docs.title: 🧠 示例样本结构
docs.text:
sample = dict(
    obs=dict(
        left_ee_pose=torch.Tensor(obs_size, 7),
        right_ee_pose=torch.Tensor(obs_size, 7),
        left_arm=torch.Tensor(obs_size, arm_size),
        right_arm=torch.Tensor(obs_size, arm_size),
        left_gripper=torch.Tensor(obs_size, 1),
        right_gripper=torch.Tensor(obs_size, 1),
        episode_start_left_ee_pose=torch.Tensor(1, 7),
        episode_start_right_ee_pose=torch.Tensor(1, 7),
        head_rgb=torch.Tensor(obs_size, 3, H, W),
        left_wrist_rgb=torch.Tensor(obs_size, 3, H, W),
        right_wrist_rgb=torch.Tensor(obs_size, 3, H, W),
    ),
    action=dict(
        left_ee_pose=torch.Tensor(chunk_size, 7),
        right_ee_pose=torch.Tensor(chunk_size, 7),
        left_arm=torch.Tensor(chunk_size, arm_size),
        right_arm=torch.Tensor(chunk_size, arm_size),
        left_gripper=torch.Tensor(chunk_size, 1),
        right_gripper=torch.Tensor(chunk_size, 1),
    ),
    gt_action=action,
)

docs.title: 🛠 训练
docs.text:
export GALAXEA_DP_WORK_DIR=out
bash train.sh trainer.devices=[0,1,2,3] task=sim/R1ProBlocksStackEasy_eef

docs.title: 📊 评估
docs.text:
bash eval_lerobot.sh trainer.devices=[0] task=open_galaxea/<robot>/<task> \
  ckpt_path=out/open_galaxea/<robot>/<task>/<time>/checkpoints/step_20000.ckpt

bash eval_sim.sh trainer.devices=[0] task=sim/<task> \
  ckpt_path=out/sim/<task>/checkpoints/step_20000.ckpt

docs.title: 📂 数据集（以 R1Pro 为例）
docs.text:
"observation.images.head_rgb": (360, 640, 3)
"observation.images.left_wrist_rgb": (480, 640, 3)
"observation.images.right_wrist_rgb": (480, 640, 3)
"observation.state.left_arm": (7,)
"observation.state.left_arm.velocities": (7,)
"observation.state.right_arm": (7,)
"observation.state.right_arm.velocities": (7,)
"observation.state.left_ee_pose": (7,)
"observation.state.right_ee_pose": (7,)
"observation.state.left_gripper": (1,)
"observation.state.right_gripper": (1,)
"observation.state.chassis": (3,)
"observation.state.chassis.velocities": (6,)
"observation.state.torso": (4,)
"observation.state.torso.velocities": (4,)
"action.left_ee_pose": (7,)
"action.right_ee_pose": (7,)
"action.left_arm": (7,)
"action.right_arm": (7,)
"action.left_gripper": (1,)
"action.right_gripper": (1,)

docs.title: 许可与致谢
docs.text:
• MIT 许可
  • 致谢 Diffusion Policy、LeRobot、Robotwin

  title={Galaxea Diffusion Policy},
  author={Galaxea Team},

docs.title: 🤖 Galaxea 操作仿真器
docs.text: 提供仿真基准、专家演示流水线与基线策略，适用于 Galaxea R1 系列。用于收集高质量演示、转换为 LeRobot 数据集，并训练/评估扩散策略。

docs.title: ✨ 特性
docs.text:
• 覆盖 30+ 环境，17 类任务
  • 一键安装与资产注册
  • 关节空间与 relaxed-ik（末端）控制器
  • 兼容 LeRobot 数据集
  • 基线 DP 训练与评估（含视频/指标）

docs.title: 🚀 安装（独立）
docs.text:
前置：Linux + CUDA GPU

conda create -n galaxea-sim python=3.10 -y
conda activate galaxea-sim
pip install -e .

# 安装 LeRobot
cd ..
git clone https://github.com/huggingface/lerobot.git
cd lerobot
git checkout a5e0aae13a3efd0080ac7ab6b461980d644014ab
pip install -e .
export PYTHONPATH="your_lerobot_codebase_path:$PYTHONPATH"

与 Galaxea DP 一起安装时，请参考 Galaxea DP 安装说明。

下载资产：

gdown https://drive.google.com/file/d/1ZvtCv1H4FLrse_ElUWzsVDt8xRK4CyaC/
unzip robotwin_models.zip
mv robotwin_models galaxea_sim/assets/

若遇到 datasets 包缓存冲突，请清理 ~/.cache/huggingface/datasets。

docs.title: 🎮 采集演示
docs.text: 支持： - R1：R1DualBottlesPickEasy — 关节/relaxed_ik - R1 Pro：R1ProBlocksStackEasy — 关节/relaxed_ik - R1 Lite：R1LiteBlocksStackEasy — 关节

docs.title: 1) 生成原始演示（mplib）
docs.text:
python -m galaxea_sim.scripts.collect_demos --env-name R1DualBottlesPickEasy --num-demos 100
python -m galaxea_sim.scripts.collect_demos --env-name R1ProBlocksStackEasy --num-demos 100
python -m galaxea_sim.scripts.collect_demos --env-name R1LiteBlocksStackEasy --num-demos 100

默认 --obs_mode=state，数据保存在 datasets/<env-name>/<date-time>。

docs.title: 2) 指定控制器回放
docs.text:
python -m galaxea_sim.scripts.replay_demos --env-name R1DualBottlesPickEasy --target_controller_type bimanual_joint_position --num-demos 100
python -m galaxea_sim.scripts.replay_demos --env-name R1ProBlocksStackEasy --target_controller_type bimanual_relaxed_ik --num-demos 100
python -m galaxea_sim.scripts.replay_demos --env-name R1LiteBlocksStackEasy --target_controller_type bimanual_joint_position --num-demos 100

回放将过滤无 IK 解的轨迹，并保存图像/深度至 datasets/<env-name>/final。

docs.title: 转换为 LeRobot 数据集
docs.text:
Galaxea DP 使用 convert_single_galaxea_sim_to_galaxea_lerobot（relaxed_ik 需加 --use_eef）。LeRobot DP 使用 convert_single_galaxea_sim_to_lerobot。

# LeRobot DP 示例
python -m galaxea_sim.scripts.convert_single_galaxea_sim_to_lerobot --task R1DualBottlesPickEasy --tag final --robot r1
python -m galaxea_sim.scripts.convert_single_galaxea_sim_to_lerobot --task R1ProBlocksStackEasy --tag final --robot r1_pro
python -m galaxea_sim.scripts.convert_single_galaxea_sim_to_lerobot --task R1LiteBlocksStackEasy --tag final --robot r1_lite

# 末端控制示例
python -m galaxea_sim.scripts.convert_single_galaxea_sim_to_lerobot --robot r1_pro --task R1ProDualBottlesPickEasy --tag final --use_eef
python -m galaxea_sim.scripts.convert_single_galaxea_sim_to_lerobot --robot r1_pro --task R1ProBlocksStackEasy --tag final --use_eef

可选 --use_video 将图像存为视频；需安装 ffmpeg，必要时在 .../site-packages/lerobot/common/datasets/video_utils.py 中将 vcodec 改为 libx264。

docs.title: Galaxea DP
docs.text:
# 图像
observation.images.head_rgb: (224, 224, 3)
observation.images.left_wrist_rgb: (224, 224, 3)
observation.images.right_wrist_rgb: (224, 224, 3)
# 深度
observation.depth.head_depth: (224, 224)
# 状态/动作（EEF 控制；arm_dof：R1/R1Lite=6，R1Pro=7）
observation.state.left_arm_joints: (arm_dof,)
observation.state.left_gripper: (1,)
observation.state.right_arm_joints: (arm_dof,)
observation.state.right_gripper: (1,)
action.left_arm_joints: (arm_dof,)
action.left_gripper: (1,)
action.right_arm_joints: (arm_dof,)
action.right_gripper: (1,)

docs.title: LeRobot DP
docs.text:
# 图像
observation.images.rgb_head: (224, 224, 3)
observation.images.rgb_left_hand: (224, 224, 3)
observation.images.rgb_right_hand: (224, 224, 3)
# 状态/动作（EEF 控制）
observation.state: (2*arm_dof + 2,)
action: (2*arm_dof + 2,)
# 状态/动作（关节控制）
observation.state: (16,)
action: (16,)

docs.title: 训练与评估
docs.text:
python -m galaxea_sim.scripts.train_lerobot_dp_policy --task R1DualBottlesPickEasy
python -m galaxea_sim.scripts.train_lerobot_dp_policy --task R1ProBlocksStackEasy
python -m galaxea_sim.scripts.train_lerobot_dp_policy --task R1LiteBlocksStackEasy

python -m galaxea_sim.scripts.eval_lerobot_dp_policy --task R1DualBottlesPickEasy --pretrained-policy-path outputs/train/R1DualBottlesPickEasy/diffusion/.../checkpoint --target_controller_type bimanual_joint_position
python -m galaxea_sim.scripts.eval_lerobot_dp_policy --task R1ProBlocksStackEasy --pretrained-policy-path outputs/train/R1ProBlocksStackEasy/diffusion/.../checkpoint --target_controller_type bimanual_joint_position
python -m galaxea_sim.scripts.eval_lerobot_dp_policy --task R1LiteBlocksStackEasy --pretrained-policy-path outputs/train/R1LiteBlocksStackEasy/diffusion/.../checkpoint --target_controller_type bimanual_joint_position
